page.title: 18TRADE IN PLAISTOW
page.content:
{ {Plaistow Stores}is in a 100 year old house which was once the village bakery. The owners live in the attached house. They sell groceries, sweets, wine, newspapers and general goods. It is a meeting place for local people.
{The Post Office}is at the side of the village store. It was once a cottage. It moved here from a Victorian house near Todhurst Manor 5 years ago. They also sell small antiques, seeds and stationery.
There is also another little shop which has changed three times in recent years. It was a general store, then an antique shop. It is now called {"The Spider's Web"}and sells all kinds of Oriental goods and jewellery.
